FAQ.question: Why is the RERA Certificate important?
FAQ.answer: It confirms project registration under KRERA and verifies approvals, timelines, and promoter compliance.

FAQ.question: Do all urban projects require RERA registration?
FAQ.answer: Yes. Most housing and commercial developments must be registered if they meet regulatory thresholds.

FAQ.question: Is RERA data from JaaGa authentic?
FAQ.answer: Yes. All information is sourced directly from KRERA without modification.
